casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Robert JONES 669P03-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Tony Robert Jones, For Jones, Tony Robert. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, For State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of January 2017 by Defendant for Rehearing of Motion to Dismiss: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017." Ervin, J. recused
